channel.title: How to change ip adress of server nd client HELP IM STUCK
channel.description: well I know this might be very easy for you guys but for me it's not so how do i change my ip address of server and client to make it work I already made my no-ip.org and each time i put it in my server and client it says error unable to connect to server please help me.

item.title: How to change ip adress of server nd client HELP IM STUCK
item.dc:creator: @lol0 lol0
item.description:
@lol0 wrote:

thanks man thats what ive been doing wrong the whole time ive been changing my sources ip with the clients ip. FML TYSM

Read full topic

item.title: How to change ip adress of server nd client HELP IM STUCK
item.dc:creator: @T0xicsnip3r T0xicsnip3r
item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

U dont change anything in the source…
open up ur client , and go to client.java .
then hit control F and search for “server =”
make sure u have a space between server and =
u shud see the server ip there , change it to ur no-ip for example: “vaginasrnice.no-ip.org”
then save , compile , and go to ur desktop and right click the client folder and hit "add to (whatever the client folders name is) it shud make a winrar file which u can put up for people to download , but they might have problems loading the cache depending if u have auto cache downloader or not , but forget that for now…
after u made the winrar downloadable file for ur players to play , go back to ur client , open client.java again and change the server ip from ur no-ip to “127.0.0.1” then save and compile , u must be connected to 127.0.0.1 always , to be able to log in. ur players need a client that connects to ur no ip.

So recap: dont do anything in the source or anything else , all u need is to go to ur client , open client.java change that to ur no ip to make a client for ur players , then change it back to 127.0.0.1 for u to play . make sure ur source is running 24/7 or else ur players wont be able to connect

Read full topic

item.title: How to change ip adress of server nd client HELP IM STUCK
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Onix:

Connect to your localhost or your loopback adapter (Normally 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1).

He means : The other players can only connect to your no-ip.
Set your Client to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 to Connect
